mapper.select: select id,user_name,id_card,bank_card_no,phone_number,issue_authority,start_date,end_date,family_address,obverse_id,obverse_code,obverse_address, obverse_name,back_id,back_code,back_address,back_name,power_id,power_code,power_address,power_name,credit_power,user_id,order_state,transaction_code from zyjr_borrower where order_state=1 and transaction_code=#{transactionCode}

select id,user_name,id_card,bank_card_no,phone_number,issue_authority,start_date,end_date,family_address,company,company_address,year_income,obverse_id, obverse_code,obverse_address,obverse_name,back_id,back_code,back_address,back_name,power_id,power_code,power_address,power_name,credit_power,people_ship,user_id,business_role,order_state,transaction_code from zyjr_relation where order_state=1 and transaction_code=#{transactionCode}

select id,user_name,id_card,bank_card_no,phone_number,issue_authority,start_date,end_date,family_address,company,company_address,year_income,obverse_id, obverse_code,obverse_address,obverse_name,back_id,back_code,back_address,back_name,power_id,power_code,power_address,power_name,credit_power,people_ship,user_id,order_state,transaction_code from zyjr_guarantee where order_state=1 and transaction_code=#{transactionCode}
mapper.insert: insert into zyjr_repeat_opinion (advise, approval_type, transaction_code, user_id) values (#{advise},#{approvalType},#{transactionCode},#{userId})
mapper.select: select distinct b.id, a.team,e.create_time,d.repeat_id,d.repeat_by,a.car_information, d.actual_price, d.loan_amount, d.repayment_term, a.car_type, b.user_id, b.order_state,b.transaction_code,b.user_name as name,c.approval_type from zyjr_borrower b left join zyjr_start_page e on b.transaction_code=e.transaction_code left join zyjr_business a on e.transaction_code=a.transaction_code left join zyjr_car_loan d on a.transaction_code=d.transaction_code left join zyjr_repeat_opinion c on d.transaction_code=c.transaction_code where a.transaction_code in (select transaction_code from zyjr_allow_opinion where approval_type=1 and c.approval_type!=1 or c.approval_type is null)

select distinct b.id, a.team,e.create_time,d.grant_id,d.grant_by,a.car_information, d.actual_price, d.loan_amount, d.repayment_term, a.car_type, b.user_id, b.order_state,b.transaction_code,b.user_name as name,c.approval_type from zyjr_borrower b left join zyjr_start_page e on b.transaction_code=e.transaction_code left join zyjr_business a on e.transaction_code=a.transaction_code left join zyjr_car_loan d on a.transaction_code=d.transaction_code left join zyjr_grant_opinion c on d.transaction_code=c.transaction_code where a.transaction_code in (select transaction_code from zyjr_repeat_opinion where approval_type=1 and c.approval_type!=1 or c.approval_type is null)
mapper.insert: insert into zyjr_grant_opinion (advise, approval_type, transaction_code, user_id) values (#{advise},#{approvalType},#{transactionCode},#{userId})
mapper.select: select a.user_id,a.transaction_code,a.user_name,a.id_card,a.bank_card_no,a.phone_number,b.fund_side, c.actual_price,c.loan_amount,c.repayment_term,c.interest_rate,c.deposit from zyjr_borrower a left join zyjr_start_page b on b.transaction_code=a.transaction_code left join zyjr_car_loan c on c.transaction_code=b.transaction_code where a.transaction_code=#{transaction_code}

SELECT distinct b.id, a.team,e.create_time,d.allow_id,d.allow_by,a.car_information, d.actual_price, d.loan_amount, d.repayment_term, a.car_type, b.user_id, b.order_state,b.transaction_code,b.user_name AS NAME,c.approval_type FROM zyjr_borrower b left join zyjr_start_page e on b.transaction_code=e.transaction_code left join zyjr_business a on e.transaction_code=a.transaction_code left join zyjr_car_loan d on a.transaction_code=d.transaction_code LEFT JOIN zyjr_allow_opinion c ON d.transaction_code=c.transaction_code WHERE c.approval_type!=1 OR c.approval_type IS NULL

select a.transaction_code,a.user_name,a.id_card,b.fund_side,c.team,c.car_type,d.submit_state from zyjr_borrower a left join zyjr_start_page b on b.transaction_code=a.transaction_code left join zyjr_business c on c.transaction_code=b.transaction_code left join zyjr_shangpai d on d.transaction_code=c.transaction_code where a.transaction_code in (select transaction_code from zyjr_fangkuan where count is not null)

select a.transaction_code,a.user_name,a.id_card,b.fund_side,c.team,c.car_type,d.submit_state from zyjr_borrower a left join zyjr_start_page b on b.transaction_code=a.transaction_code left join zyjr_business c on c.transaction_code=b.transaction_code left join zyjr_diya d on d.transaction_code=c.transaction_code where a.transaction_code in (select transaction_code from zyjr_shangpai_opinion where approval_type=1)
